SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller.Interfaces

Interface ControllerInterface

All Superinterfaces:
Remote, Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
VirtualController
All Known Implementing Classes:
Controller, VirtualControllerRMI, VirtualControllerSocket
public interface ControllerInterface extends Remote, Serializable
This interface is used to define the methods that the player can call to interact with the server and the game It extends the Remote and Serializable interface to be used in the RMI protocol

    This method is used to draw a card from the decks
    void
    joinLobby(String lobbyName)
    This method is used to join an existent lobby adding the player to the lobby and updating its view If the lobby becomes full after the player joins, the game starts If the lobby doesn't exist, the player is notified
    void
    leave()
    This method is used to leave from whichever state the player is in and moves him back to the main menu
    void

    This method is used to leave the lobby the player is in and moves him back to the lobbyList

    login(String nickname)
    This method is used to log In the player setting the nickname chosen by the player and biding the controller to the player view If the nickname is already taken, the player is notified If the nickname was in a game, the player is reconnected to the game

    This method is used to place a card on the board It can either be the startCard or a cardInHand

  • Method Details

    • login

      void login(String nickname) throws Exception
      This method is used to log In the player setting the nickname chosen by the player and biding the controller to the player view If the nickname is already taken, the player is notified If the nickname was in a game, the player is reconnected to the game
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the player
      Throws:
      Exception - required by the RMI protocol

    • createLobby

      void createLobby(String gameName, int maxPlayerCount) throws Exception
      This method publishes a new lobby creating it If the lobby name is already taken, the player is notified
      Parameters:
      gameName - the name of the lobby
      maxPlayerCount - the maximum number of players that can join the lobby
      Throws:
      Exception - required by the RMI protocol

    • joinLobby

      void joinLobby(String lobbyName) throws Exception
      This method is used to join an existent lobby adding the player to the lobby and updating its view If the lobby becomes full after the player joins, the game starts If the lobby doesn't exist, the player is notified
      Parameters:
      lobbyName - the name of the lobby to join
      Throws:
      Exception - required by the RMI protocol

    • leave

      void leave() throws Exception
      This method is used to leave from whichever state the player is in and moves him back to the main menu
      Throws:
      Exception - required by the RMI protocol

    • leaveLobby

      void leaveLobby() throws Exception
      This method is used to leave the lobby the player is in and moves him back to the lobbyList
      Throws:
      Exception - required by the RMI protocol

    • chooseSecretObjective

      void chooseSecretObjective(LightCard objectiveCard) throws Exception
      This method is used to choose the secret objective card by the player
      Parameters:
      objectiveCard - the secret objective card chosen by the player
      Throws:
      Exception - required by the RMI protocol

    • choosePawn

      void choosePawn(PawnColors color) throws Exception
      This method is used to choose the pawn color by the player
      Parameters:
      color - the pawn color chosen by the player
      Throws:
      Exception - required by the RMI protocol

    • place

      void place(LightPlacement placement) throws Exception
      This method is used to place a card on the board It can either be the startCard or a cardInHand
      Parameters:
      placement - the placement of the pawn
      Throws:
      Exception - required by the RMI protocol

    • draw

      void draw(DrawableCard deckID, int cardID) throws Exception
      This method is used to draw a card from the decks
      Parameters:
      deckID - the deck from which the card is drawn (either Resource or Gold)
      cardID - the position of the card to draw (0,1 for the buffer, 2 for the deck)
      Throws:
      Exception - required by the RMI protocol

    • sendChatMessage

      void sendChatMessage(ChatMessage message) throws Exception
      This method is used to send a chat message to the other players
      Parameters:
      message - the message to send
      Throws:
      Exception - required by the RMI protocol
